entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Indian Head
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
